components.name: banner
components.headline: Innovate. Thats what we do
components.heading: We use technology to improve peoples' lives
components.html: We research artificial intelligence and build systems that provide actionable and explainable intelligence

components.name: imageText
components.headline: _ Artificial intelligence
components.heading: AI and data science applied in some of the hardest problems
components.html: We apply our AI research in numerous fields through the combination of data science and computer science. Cancer diagnosis and classification, pandemics and linked open data are some of the fields we are working on to apply our findings. Using neural networks, natural language processing and graphs at scale, we try to solve problems that the human brain is incapable of. The core value of our systems is that they are accessible and understandable by everyone (explainable AI). Our advances are always directed at improving our quality of life.

cards.headline: Artificial intelligence
cards.heading: Human brains are great, but as data gets bigger, they too, need help.
